C.R.A.Z.Y.

Rank: 379


Zachary is confused about his sexuality and is in conflict with his Catholic upbringing which alienates his parents. Forcing himself to like girls- Zachary also has to cope with his older brothers- who don't make his life any easier.


Director: Jean-Marc Vallée

Writer: Jean,Marc Vallée, François Boulay

Stars: Michel Côté, Marc,André Grondin, Danielle Proulx

Tags: Coming,of,Age, Teen Drama, Comedy, Drama
